document_data.caption: A map showing Caer Moray in northern Moray.
document_data.name: Caer Moray
document_data.mainbody: '''Caer Moray''' was a coastal town on the island of [[Moray]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Caer Moray was located in northern Moray on the coast of the [[Sea of Moonshae]] where the [[Shannyth River]] met the sea.
document_data.Description: A wooden palisade surrounded the town.{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|10}}
document_data.Inhabitants: The town was inhabited by 1,500 loyal servants of the High King during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The town was a frequent target of the [[Black Blood tribe]], though these attacks seldom resulted in anything more than a few [[lycanthrope]] deaths.
